column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as the food is concerned
column2: JINYA was founded by our CEO Tomonori Takahashi
column3: who owned several restaurants in Ebisu
column5: before bringing his Japanese ramen concept to the U.S. several years ago. His goal was to make the taste of JINYA ramen as authentically Japanese as possible. Again
column6: JINYA will never be all things to all people
column7: but we work very hard and give our best effort.
